extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DeckOfCards()
      Constructor to create the new deck of cards

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cardsIntoNewDeck()
      Places the 52 cards into the deck based on their suit first then by number on the card Jack - 11, Queen - 12, King - 13, Ace - 1
      Card dealCard()
      Randomly selects a card from the ArrayList to be dealt to the user
      void newDeck()
      Instantiates the ArrayList of cards to be the deck.

    • Method Detail

      • newDeck

        public void newDeck()
        Instantiates the ArrayList of cards to be the deck. Then calls another function to place cards into the deck ArrayList

      • dealCard

        public Card dealCard()
        Randomly selects a card from the ArrayList to be dealt to the user
        Returns:
        the Card that was randomly chosen

      • cardsIntoNewDeck

        public void cardsIntoNewDeck()
        Places the 52 cards into the deck based on their suit first then by number on the card Jack - 11, Queen - 12, King - 13, Ace - 1
